title: Sticky sesame and soy chicken traybake
time: Hands-on time 20 min, oven time 35-40 min
description: None of the fuss but all of the flavour is what you get from this sticky sesame and soy chicken traybake. Just combine all the ingredients, pour over the chicken and pop in the oven until caramelised.

method.Step 1: Heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan/gas 4. Heat a shallow flameproof casserole over a medium heat, add the chicken legs and brown all over. Mix the soy sauce, star anise, ginger, sesame oil, honey and orange juice in a small bowl, then pour over the chicken in the casserole. Add the orange slices and roast for 35-40 minutes or until golden and cooked through, basting with the juices halfway through.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile, cook the rice in boiling salted water for 12 minutes or according to the packet instructions. Once the chicken legs are cooked, stir the spring greens into the sauce and return to the oven for another 2 minutes to wilt.

method.Step 3: Serve the chicken legs with the rice and greens, sprinkled with the spring onions.
